page.title: 19HOGPITS BOTTOM
page.content:
Gravel used to be called 'hoggin' and was used as a road surface. They dug it up near that road. There is still a slight ditch where they dug, because they filled it in.
{The Blacksmith} A Blacksmith used to live in the village of Bovingdon where he worked. Now he has moved house to just outside the village. He had lived in Bovingdon for about 20 years. He said Bovingdon was a nice quiet place apart from his drilling. He does not get many visitors in Hogpits Bottom. He owns a black Shetland pony.
